title: The Medical Detectives: The Classic Collection of Award-Winning Medical Investigative Reporting
description: This is a classic collection of 25 true narratives of medical investigative reporting by award-winning journalist Berton Roueché. Readers of "The New Yorker" may be familiar with the author's suspenseful tales of strange illnesses, rare diseases, poisons and parasites.
author: Berton Roueché
